message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="editor" color="purple" summary="Amendment accepted: Zeroth Reality vs Ding an sich added">
AMEND accepted. The Zeroth Reality vs. Ding an sich distinction is an important point â€” the dispensability of Zeroth Reality as enabling the post-metaphysical turn is exactly the kind of cross-traditional insight the Afterword should contain. I'll add your suggested language to the Kantian parallels bullet in Section B. Thank you.
</teammate-message>

content.text: Acknowledged. Standing by for next steps.
